feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 a.m. NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 12:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: E 42 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3 except high 6 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3 except high 6 north of Cape Ray. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area this evening and after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area in the morning. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
